sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Movie } from '../movie/movie'; import { MveeService } from '../movie/mvee.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'], }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { topRatedMovies!: Movie[]; latestMovies!: Movie[]; constructor(private mService: MveeService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.mService.getAllMovies().subscribe((data: Movie[]) => { this.topRatedMovies = data .sort((a, b) => (a.movieRating > b.movieRating ? -1 : 1)) .slice(0, 8); }); this.mService.getAllMovies().subscribe((data: Movie[]) => { this.latestMovies = data .sort((a, b) => (a.movieDate > b.movieDate ? -1 : 1)) .slice(0, 3); }); } }
